fulltext:
Curriculum Vitae 
Personal detail 
Full name: 
Khue Dao Tran 
Date of birth: 
March 20th, 1989 
Gender: 
Male 
Marital Status:   
Single 
Nationality:  
Vietnam 
Email:  
khuedaotran@gmail.com 
Phone:  
+84 938964203 
Current Position: 
Data Scientist,  
Trusting Social, Vietnam 
Education  
May 2012 
University of Oklahoma, Norman, OK, USA 
Bachelor of Science – Summa cum Laude – Electrical Engineering 
Aug 2014 
University of Oklahoma, Norman, OK, USA 
Master of Science – Electrical Engineering 
June 2016 
Eni Corporate University, Scuola Enrico Mattei 
Masters in Management and the Economics of Energy and the 
Enviroment 
Professional experience 
From September 2017 to Present: 
Data Scientist at Trusting Social 
Building financial models using alternative telco data, 
working across projects in Vietnam, Indonesia, India etc. 
Projects include: credit scoring, fraud modeling, ecommerce 
fraud and other related projects. 
Leading the recruiting process/training-mentoring incoming 
research engineer.  
From August 2014 to September 2017: Electrical Engineer at PetroVietnam Exploration Production 
Corporation, Field Development Division 
Preparing production report for oversea projects, following 
projects under development, preparing development plan for 
potential project, performing tasks assigned from division 
managers. Have spent 6 months working at a production 
platform as I&E engineer   
From June 2012 to June 2014:  
Graduate Research Assistant at Advanced Radar Research 
Center, University of Oklahoma 
Working with Dr. Nathan Goodman in Radar Signal 
Processing field and researching on spectral clustering 
application on enhanced knowledge compressive sensing. 
From Summer 2011 to Spring 2012:  
Research Assistant at University of Oklahoma 
Working with Dr. Ding Lei ECE Department in brain 
computer interface research (BCI2000) utilizing EEG signal, 
specifically P300 signal. 
Summer 2010:  
Research Assistant at University of Oklahoma 
Working with Dr. Choon Yik Tang ECE Department in 
network optimization 
Skills 
Language skill:   
Vietnamese, English, Italian (elementary) 
Programming skill:  
Python, Matlab, Spark, Hadoop, Java, Assembly Language 
Computer skill:  
Word, Excel, Power Point, Visio, Window OS, Mac OS, 
Soft skill: 
Ability to work under pressure, analytical mind, presentation and 
communication skill 
Academic Achievements  
President’s Honor Roll 
University College Dean’s Honor Roll 
Billy A Couch Scholarship - ECE Department 2010-2011 
Merle Ward Lucas Scholarship - ECE Department 2011-2012 
OG&E Scholarship from ECE Department 2011-2012 
References 
Available upon request
